name: MagickaFlower
description:
Game made for GameDev.tv Community Jam

I made this game using:
-Unity 
-PiskelApp 
-Leshy SFMaker 
-Bosca Ceoil

Controls:
-Use arrows/WASD to move
-Press R to restart level
-Press Z/J to use orange flower to freeze time
-Press X/K to use blue flower to jump on enemies (while time is frozen!)

Source code: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1vqWziato607l4BxlmLrpfhokj4cxnglr?usp=sha...
